title: Identify process where no work done on or by gas

content.description: A closed chamber filled with a gas that is modeled as ideal has a movable piston of area A. The graph above of pressure P as a function of volume V shows three processes that make up cycle XYZX through which the gas is taken. Process ZX is isothermal.
content.question: During which process is no work done on or by the gas?

choices.label: Work was done on or by the gas during every process

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
